info.author: Niels Steurer
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
plonetheme.tidyblog Package Readme
==================================

--------------
Tidyblog theme
--------------

This is a visual theme for Plone 3. It's based on the following skin:

"Tidy Blog" (http://www.oswd.org/design/information/id/3505) by Aaron Ganschow

This theme was initially generated with the plone3_theme recipe from ZopeSkeland using paster.

We tested it with IE 6 and IE 7, Firefox 2 and Safari.

Screenshot at "http://d9t.de/os/plone-plonetheme.tidyblog/tidyblog.png/image_view_fullscreen"

Changelog
=========

1.0 - *First release
----------------
* Initial release

1.1 - Second release
----------------
added the readme in plonetheme.tidyblog/ and clean up the files

1.2 - added Screenshot in the readme
----------------
added a link to a screenshot of this theme

1.2.1 - changed the manifest data
